title: I need help with window mode and alt tabing
body: So, every time I play league I play in full screen but when I click off to my other monitor it minimizes the client. I read that if I go into windowed mode or border less mode that it would help but when I change to one of those my client zooms in really far and spreads through my first monitor and half of my second. It won't let me change the size of the window either. Help please I have no idea how to fix this.

replies.body:
After changing over to a Borderless or Windowed Mode, can you ensure your display resolution is set correctly? If that setting gets skewed, it could cause issues with your window sizing.

Let me know what you find.
My resolution stays the same when I go into the other modes. Also, my two monitors are different sizes but even when I change the resolution to the same thing it still zooms and doesn't work.

Gotcha. So, we'll need to take a look at your system logs to determine what's causing all this ruckus. I recommend running grabbing some logs with our [**HRT App**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367), then attaching the zipped log file to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so a tech specialist can get back to you.

Let me know if you run into issues.
